title: Drdobermann's Artworks
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]

------
+ Hello!

I'm [[*user Drdobermann]], a newbie from Korean SCP wiki.
I have often drawn some SCP artworks so far, and I decided to post my works here, too.

Thank and Enjoy my artworks!

[[/=]]
------
[[=]]
